Changelog
=========


1.1.2 (2014-02-18)
------------------

- Moved package to GitHub.
  [lknoepfel]


1.1.1 (2013-08-14)
------------------

- Corrected initial database name.
  [deif]


1.1 (2012-11-28)
----------------

- Dropped Plone 4.1 compatibility. Only 4.2 and up are supported.
  [lgraf]



1.0.1 (2012-09-12)
------------------

- Added important configuration options in the mysql db conf and creation script.
  [phgross]




1.0 (2011-11-17)
----------------

- Initial release
